doc.title: Gimme Sugar: Miami
doc.plot: Gimme Sugar is going to sexy, sizzling Miami! With the success of Truck Stop, West Hollywood's hottest Friday night party for women, Charlene takes on her biggest challenge yet. She has just a few short weeks to launch a Truck Stop night in the Miami scene. Charlene leaves the comfort of her LA friends behind and moves into a fabulous South Beach condo with a new roommate named Hilary. Through Hilary, Char meets and falls in love with a whole new group of Miami friends: Angel, Maisi, Jazmin, and Gaby. The girls help Charlene navigate the scene and support her in her endeavor, but not without a whole lot of their own personal dramas to add to the mix. Along the way, Charlene butts heads with Omar, one of the hottest promoters in Miami. In times like these, she wishes she had her friends Alex and Davonee there to help.
